titles: Fruit-walls improved, by inclining them to the horizon, or, A way to build walls for fruit-trees whereby they may receive more sun shine, and heat, than ordinary / by a member of the Royal Society.
author: Fatio de Duillier, Nicolas, 1664-1753.
notes: Attributed to Nicolas Fatio de Duillier. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
